thing-type.label: DWS01 Door and Window Sensor
thing-type.description: Door and Window Sensor<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtSensor detects when a door is open or closed, also has a tamper switch.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtNon-secure: press the Z-button three times rapidly.</p&gt <p&gtSecure: hold the Z-button for three seconds.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtPress the Z-button three times rapidly.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtWakeup Information</h2&gt<p&gtSeparate the magnet from the sensor body or pull the cover back and press the little button near the tamper switch until the little blue LED illuminates.</p&gt

parameter.name: config_14_1
parameter.label: 14: Enable / disable BASIC SET
parameter.description: Enable basic set reporting to group 2

parameter.name: config_15_1
parameter.label: 15: Value of BASIC SET
parameter.description: Value to send for BASIC SET

parameter.name: config_32_1
parameter.label: 32: Level for Low Battery Alarm
parameter.description: Adjust the percent of battery left before a low battery level alarm is sent

parameter.name: group_1
parameter.label: 1: Group 1
parameter.description: Association Group 1<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt <ul&gt<li&gt <p&gtGroup 1 reports the status of the Door/Window Sensor, the battery level, and the tamper button status. </p&gt </li&gt </ul&gt

parameter.name: group_2
parameter.label: 2: Group 2
parameter.description: Association Group 2<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt <ul&gt<li&gt <p&gtGroup 2 is assigned to the Door/Window Sensor BASIC SET command. </p&gt </li&gt </ul&gt
